projects.title: Calculator
projects.desc: A Calculator built using ReactJS is a simple and efficient tool that can be added to any portfolio to showcase the developer's skills in building user-friendly web applications. The calculator application is a straightforward tool that can perform basic arithmetic operations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

projects.title: Guess the Word
projects.desc: Guess the Word is a fun and interactive game that I created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for my portfolio. The game is designed to challenge the player's vocabulary skills by asking them to guess a hidden word. The game has a simple and user-friendly interface, making it accessible to players of all ages and skill levels.
